ygData.subject: Soldiers and Elves
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not sure how effective Whirlwind is... my guess is not very . I never really used it or Disarm because I couldn t see any effect. Charge could be altered

I'm not sure how effective Whirlwind is... my guess is
"not very". I never really used it or Disarm because I
couldn't see any effect. Charge could be altered to
automatically target an opponent that's in front of
the soldier (perhaps in a 10-o'clock-to-2-o'clock
range)... that would increase it's usefulness.
Boomerang should definitely be altered--a limit on the
number of boomerangs that can be thrown, and a wider
range of spots at which the boomerang will cause
damage in its flight.

Elves--what can I say. They throw too many rocks. I
used to run around after completing a mission,
shooting down all the stray rocks that enemy elves had
thrown that were still ricocheting around the map. I'd
like to see a limit on the rocks an elf can throw at a
time... once the maximum (which would increase with
level) had been reached, the previously thrown rocks
would disappear. Otherwise, the old rocks would
continue and the elf would be helpless at close range.
